alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mason; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:28AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, north central Mason, northwestern Jackson and southwestern Wood Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1227 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Haven, or near Pomeroy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pomeroy, Racine, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, New Haven, Mason, Sandyville, Middleport, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Portland, Belleville and Reedsville. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 143 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this and other storms in the area, and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
